attributes.action: STOP ALL WELFARE BENEFITS. DO THE SAME AS ALL OTHER COUNTRIES. NO WORK NO MONEY.
attributes.additional_details: OTHER UNITED KINGDOM SOURCES ARE ALSO BEING ABUSED AND MUST BE STOPPED IMMEDIATELY OR HAVE CHANGES MADE BEFORE TOO LATE AND UNITED KINGDOM IS COMPLETELY DESTROYED FINANCIALLY.
attributes.background: IT IS UNFAIR THAT FOREIGNERS COME TO UNITED KINGDOM TO ABUSE THE BENEFITS SYSTEM. STOP WELFARE BENEFITS AND SEE HOW MANY NO LONGER WANT TO BE IN UNITED KINGDOM. THIS IS UNFAIR TO THE BRITISH TAX PAYER AND NEEDS TO BE STOPPED.

rejection.details:
We think that you want to stop benefit payments to all migrants to the UK, but this is not clear from the petition itself. 

You may want to start another petition which makes this clearer.
